EM.content: possibility of international philosophical colloquium must take place in a medium > universality of philosophical discourse, linked to group of languages & “cultures”
EM.linkedContent: possibility of international philosophical colloquium must take place in a medium > universality of philosophical discourse, linked to group of languages & “cultures”

EM.content: absence of philosophical colloquiums [in certain parts of world] not due to overt prohibition from politico-ideological jurisdiction, in which case the issue already meaningful
EM.linkedContent: absence of philosophical colloquiums [in certain parts of world] not due to overt prohibition from politico-ideological jurisdiction, in which case the issue already meaningful

EM.content: Derrida also notes disquieting fever for colloquium [symptom of tout autre?]
EM.linkedContent: Derrida also notes disquieting fever for colloquium [symptom of tout autre?]

EM.content: interest in universality of anthropos a sign of West’s attempt to interiorize, master what’s different from it, l’effet de cette différence d’un tout autre ordre, where philosophical colloquium has no meaning, this other space neither barren, nor desert-like
EM.linkedContent: interest in universality of anthropos a sign of West’s attempt to interiorize, master what’s different from it, l’effet de cette différence d’un tout autre ordre, where philosophical colloquium has no meaning, this other space neither barren, nor desert-like

ROP.content: Derrida frustrated that at colloquia no one ever goes into detail, swept away by voice, do w/out minutiae of letter (the micrological displacements where I incorrigibly persist in hoping things get decided—at a given moment, that’s never given)
ROP.linkedContent: Derrida frustrated that at colloquia no one ever goes into detail, swept away by voice, do w/out minutiae of letter (the micrological displacements where I incorrigibly persist in hoping things get decided—at a given moment, that’s never given)

DPi.content: can only think DP outside real theater (place of worship, witness stand, courtroom, print or televised news)—in classroom
DPi.linkedContent: can only think DP outside real theater (place of worship, witness stand, courtroom, print or televised news)—in classroom

DPi.content: seminar: knowledge is thing/mission/ethic of a seminar, not turn into militant activist cell
DPi.linkedContent: seminar: knowledge is thing/mission/ethic of a seminar, not turn into militant activist cell

DPi.content: secret: what if I deconstructed the “seminar” by telling you I won’t tell you the truth even if I know it? > blow to deconstructed pieces the idea of the seminar: which is obliged by oath to speak all possible truth
DPi.linkedContent: secret: what if I deconstructed the “seminar” by telling you I won’t tell you the truth even if I know it? > blow to deconstructed pieces the idea of the seminar: which is obliged by oath to speak all possible truth

BSi.content: a seminar that teaches knowledge must be w/out fable
BSi.linkedContent: a seminar that teaches knowledge must be w/out fable

BSi.content: fable, for, fari, to speak, to say, fabula, something said > make so as to know: 1) bring knowledge to the other 2) give impression, effect, of knowledge, of knowing, simulacrum of knowing: a savoir-faire to “faire” savoir where there is no knowing worthy of the name
BSi.linkedContent: fable, for, fari, to speak, to say, fabula, something said > make so as to know: 1) bring knowledge to the other 2) give impression, effect, of knowledge, of knowing, simulacrum of knowing: a savoir-faire to “faire” savoir where there is no knowing worthy of the name

BSi.content: an autopsy [the seminar too?], the becoming-what of the who?
BSi.linkedContent: an autopsy [the seminar too?], the becoming-what of the who?

BSi.content: logics of closure/enclosure, the threshold, le seuil interdit, question of responsibility (a question of threshold) throughout a decade of seminars [Derrida’s]
BSi.linkedContent: logics of closure/enclosure, the threshold, le seuil interdit, question of responsibility (a question of threshold) throughout a decade of seminars [Derrida’s]

BSi.content: certain indispensable schemata appear more clearly when you improvise
BSi.linkedContent: certain indispensable schemata appear more clearly when you improvise

EU.content: every operation we (students, teachers, research community) pursue together: always institution at play, contract signed, image of ideal seminar constructed, a socius implied
EU.linkedContent: every operation we (students, teachers, research community) pursue together: always institution at play, contract signed, image of ideal seminar constructed, a socius implied
